net.hudup.core.client

Class SocketConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.core.client.ProtocolImpl
      • net.hudup.core.client.SocketWrapper
        • net.hudup.core.client.SocketConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, Protocol, Service

    public class SocketConnection
extends SocketWrapper
    This class extends directly SocketWrapper class and so it is also a service that sends request to server and then receives response (result) from server, according to socket interaction. However, in the same session, it can send many requests and receive many responses (from server) whereas SocketWrapper can send/receive only one request/response to/from server at one time. In other words, SocketConnection is an advanced version of SocketWrapper.
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen
